price: Je! Hawaoni ya kwamba tunayapeleka maji kwenye ardhi kavu, kisha kwayo tunaitoa mimea wanayo kula wanyama wao na wao wenyewe? Je! Hawaoni?
arabic: أَوَلَمۡ يَرَوۡاْ أَنَّا نَسُوقُ ٱلۡمَآءَ إِلَى ٱلۡأَرۡضِ ٱلۡجُرُزِ فَنُخۡرِجُ بِهِۦ زَرۡعٗا تَأۡكُلُ مِنۡهُ أَنۡعَٰمُهُمۡ وَأَنفُسُهُمۡۚ أَفَلَا يُبۡصِرُونَ
footnotes: Wameingia upofu, na wala hawaoni ya kwamba hakika Sisi tunapeleka mvua na mito kwenye ardhi za ukame ambazo hazimei mimea, na tukaziotesha mazao yake, wakala wanyama wao, na wao wenyewe wakala nafaka zake na matunda yake? Wamepofuka, na kwa hivyo hawazioni dalili za Mwenyezi Mungu za kuwafufua wafu.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: awalam yaraw annā nasūqu al-māa ilā al-arḍi al-juruzi fanukh'riju bihi zarʿan takulu min'hu anʿāmuhum wa-anfusuhum afalā yub'ṣirūna
